title: [Ruins, Stone Parapets]
description: Parapetlike carved stone accents the edges of the circular terrace.  Small crystals are positioned on top of each parapet, humming with energy.  A pair of stone stools offer respite for those on watch.
Parapet-like carved stone accents the edges of the platform.  Small crystals are positioned on top of each parapet, humming with energy.  A pair of stone stools offer respite for those on watch.
